CustomField.description: This field is used for internal purpose. It is to create report of D&S users having access to ATR opportunities
CustomField.formula: CASE(User__r.Profile.Name, 'D&S Sales', "D&S", 'D&S Sales Admin', "D&S", 'D&S Sales Analyst',"D&S", "Non D&S")
CustomField.label: User SBU Formula
